title: Solihull Moors: Man charged after football homophobia reports
article: A man has been charged following a police investigation into reports of homophobic comments at a football match. The probe was in connection with Solihull Moors' home game against Stockport County on 28 December 2021. Peter Wild, 54, is set to appear before Birmingham Magistrates Court on 23 February.
